meanings.definition: Covered in small hills or mounds
meanings.sent1: The hillocky terrain made it difficult to ride a bike smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The backyard had a hillocky appearance after the moles had been busy.
meanings.sent3: The hillocky landscape looked like a bumpy green carpet.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt hillocky, like tiny hills under her fingertips.
meanings.sent5: The hillocky ground felt like a lumpy mattress underfoot.

meanings.sent1: The hillocky rock formation stood out against the flat plain.
meanings.sent2: The artist captured the hillocky shape of the hill in his painting.
meanings.sent3: The hillocky cloud in the sky looked like a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was styled in a hillocky bun on top of her head.
meanings.sent5: The hillocky silhouette of the mountain was striking against the sunset.
